title: Is it possible to use one CPU to run separate computers? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is exactly what virtual computing does. Virtualization lets you maximize the use of your hardware by running multiple computers on the same hardware. As there is intricate circuitry involved with a motherboard, this is the only way I would seriously consider the question.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Md Safayet Islam

response.answer_text: Depends on what you mean by seperate computers. If you mean two operating systems, it is possible, by creating what’s referred to as a “virtual machine.” Essentially, one OS will run at the base level, then allocate resources to the second.
